document.discussion_title: Brickbat: Keep Quiet | The Unofficial Megyn Kelly
document.topic_text: Author: Reason.com Full Feed A British court has sentenced Stephen Bennett to 12 months probation and 180 hours of community service for posting “grossly offensive” comments on a police website. Local media did not report what those comments were but said one was offensive to Asian women and one was offensive to Muslims. Click Reason.com Full Feed Now To Read: Brickbat: Keep Quiet by SHARE
